dialogue.name: BABETHIRONHEART
dialogue.text: Beg pardon, good madamsir. I could scarce help but notice that sightseeing log on your person. You wouldn't happen to be the adventurer my niece wrote about...would you?

dialogue.name: BABETHIRONHEART
dialogue.text: ...Aha! So it is you. Pleased to make your acquaintance. I am Babeth Ironheart, Millith's aunt and seasoned explorer.

dialogue.name: BABETHIRONHEART
dialogue.text: Be a dear and hand me that log of yours. Millith told me all about how she helped you embark on explorations of your own, so it's only right that I share with you some wisdom of my own.

dialogue.name: BABETHIRONHEART
dialogue.text: Let me see here... Oh, I can't forget to mention that... And done!

dialogue.name: BABETHIRONHEART
dialogue.text: You should be all set, dear. I've jotted down everything I've heard about the most remarkable vistas the realm has to offer.

dialogue.name: BABETHIRONHEART
dialogue.text: Of course, a few notes I've shared are naught more than rumors─some describing locales so fantastical that I can barely believe they exist. But as I always say, the true joy of exploration lies not in the destination, but in the journey.

dialogue.name: BABETHIRONHEART
dialogue.text: So go forth, dear, and see what sort of journey these hints take you on. That sightseeing log of yours won't fill itself, you know!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Endwalker entries have been added to your sightseeing log!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be level 80 or above to record Endwalker vistas. Travel to the location indicated and fulfill the necessary conditions and you will complete the entry for that vista, earning experience points in the process.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Use your wits and the notes provided by Babeth to identify these stunning sights and the proper way to appreciate them, and see Thavnair, Sharlayan, and beyond as only the greatest explorers have seen them!
